articles.title: Abstain from no-trust vote, do not attend National Assembly: Imran Khan's whip to party members - India Today
articles.description: Imran Khan is facing a no-trust vote, brought against him by the Leader of the Opposition, Shehbaz Sharif. Khan must have the support of 172 members in the 342-member National Assembly to save his government.

articles.title: John Abraham refuses to talk about The Kashmir Files at Attack event, asks 'why will I do that'? - India Today
articles.description: John Abraham refused to comment on The Kashmir Files at his upcoming film Attack’s press conference. He told the media what kind of questions should be asked and advised them to not seek controversy.
